DataElement.preferredName: Trial Screening Informed Consent Form Signature Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which the patient signed the screening informed consent form.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial._A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian._Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.:A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

Concepts.definition: A process of active consideration of potential subjects for enrollment in a trial.

A document explaining all the relevant information to assist an individual in understanding the expectations and risks in making a decision about a procedure. This document is presented to and signed by the individual or guardian.

Property.preferredDefinition: Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; an identifying feature or characteristic of something or someone; an alternative term for motif or pattern; the part of the prescription that contains directions to the patient for taking of medicine.

Concepts.definition: Individual's name or personal mark, used to sign documents and employed to signify that the writing which precedes accords with one's wishes and intentions; having a handwritten signature.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
